description: Upsales Technology AB develops, markets, and sells cloud-based software, software as a service, for customer relationship management, marketing automation, and analysis. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 67 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2019-04-24. The company develops, markets and sells a cloud-based software, SaaS (software as a service), for CRM (customer relationship management), marketing automation and analysis. The Company’s analysis tool helps the customers to gain better insight into the deal and can derive income from specific market initiatives. The firm is focused on B2B (business to business) companies, primarily SMEs (small and medium enterprises) active in the IT (information technology) and software, media and financial services industries, among others.
name: Upsales Technology AB
